programme.title: Danny Bible/License To Kill
programme.desc: Cold Case Files Classic, S03E21, A Texas woman's murder is finally solved when the killer's plan to kill a second woman and stuff her into a duffel bag goes awry.

programme.title: Cold Case Files Classics
programme.desc: Cold Case Files Classic, S05E10, A detective vows not to shave until he solves the murder of a young Oregon woman. It takes three years and a string of Mexican Mafia informants to crack the case and allow the dedicated detective to shave his beard.

programme.title: Lone Survivor
programme.desc: Cold Case Files, S02E27, In early 1984, three-year-old Vanessa Bennett becomes the lone survivor of her family's brutal murder. Initial investigators suspect a serial killer is at large, but decades pass before DNA narrows the suspect pool to one man.

programme.title: The Heartland Killer
programme.desc: Cold Case Files, S02E05, In the 1980s, a suspected serial killer preyed on women in small towns located on the banks of the Mississippi River until the murders abruptly ceased and went unsolved.

programme.title: Cold Case Files Classics
programme.desc: Cold Case Files Classic, S05E22, The killing of a woman in a VA goes unsolved for a quarter of a century before investigators are finally able to zero in on the likely killer. And, in 1999 detectives test the blood evidence and develop a DNA profile of a shooting death from 1980.

programme.title: A is for Arson
programme.desc: Cold Case Files, S02E23, Firefighter Gary Parks is killed in a fire ruled arson, the investigation into his death shifts to homicide. A serial arsonist is thought to be the culprit.

programme.title: Bump In The Night/Hitchhike To Murder
programme.desc: Cold Case Files Classic, S03E24, A woman who takes down the license plate number of a car that had been following her helps police solve the murder of another young woman.

programme.title: A Killer's Skin / Where's Peggy? (#110)
programme.desc: Cold Case Files Classic, S05E28, Police in Albany, N.Y., get a surprise when a killer they think targets only older women is suspected in the murder of an elderly man. And the contents of a secret storage shed holds the grisly clues to a murder that has gone cold for more than 14 years.

programme.title: Little Girl Lost
programme.desc: Cold Case Files, S01E01, Halloween in a small town is canceled indefinitely when a young girl is kidnapped and killed on her way home from a costume party.

programme.title: Traces Of Murder/The Bathtub Killer
programme.desc: Cold Case Files Classic, S01E09, A killer helps convict himself when he boasts about his crime to prison cellmates; and New Hampshire investigators probing the murder of a pregnant woman found raped, strangled, and dumped into her bathtub, get a new lead.

programme.title: Killer on Campus / The Bow Hunter
programme.desc: Cold Case Files Classic, S05E15, Thirty-two years after the killing of University of Michigan law student Jane Mixer, police use DNA found on her pantyhose to finally track down the killer.

programme.title: Cold Case Files Classics
programme.desc: Cold Case Files Classic, S05E14, A serial rapist seals his own fate when he sends a taunting letter to police. And when a man is found dead in South Dakota, his head bashed in by a 50-pound rock, investigators go on a 20-year search for the killers.

programme.title: Family Secret/Justice Delayed
programme.desc: Cold Case Files Classic, S02E05, Forty-one years after the crime, a woman implicates her brother and cousin in the murder of a policeman.

programme.title: Cold Case Files Classics
programme.desc: Cold Case Files Classic, S05E17, In Rhode Island, policewomen go undercover as streetwalkers to nab the man suspected of murdering three prostitutes. And a dagger-shaped letter opener is the key piece of evidence that links a priest to the grisly 1980 murder of a nun in Ohio.

programme.title: Missing and Murdered
programme.desc: Cold Case Files, S02E26, In Cree culture, a promise is sacred. When Cree woman Shirley Soosay goes missing in 1980, her niece Violet promises her grandmother that she will bring Shirley home.

programme.title: Written In Blood
programme.desc: Cold Case Files, S02E19, In July of 1970, the brutal murder of single mom Loretta Jones leaves four-year-old Heidi motherless. Nearly 40 years later, she vows to solve her mother's cold case.

programme.title: Vanished in Virginia
programme.desc: Cold Case Files, S03E05, When a 30-year-old mother fails to report for duty in Virginia, the Army lists her as AWOL. Her family immediately suspects foul play. They embark on a 13-year quest for answers before an eyewitness blows the case wide open.

programme.title: It's Always Nashville
programme.desc: Chesapeake Shores, S02E04, Hallmark Original Series. Trace hits the road to record an album with his ex-girlfriend.

programme.title: Finding Her Pink
programme.desc: The Motherhood, S01E01, Tasha poured everything into being a mom, but lost herself. With support from The Motherhood, Tasha learns to set boundaries, reclaim her space, and rediscover her confidence, ...

The Piano Lesson, 19950205000000 +0000, A family is torn by the choice of keeping a valuable family heirloom piano or selling it to improve their lives. Stars Charles S. Dutton, Alfre Woodard, and Courtney B. Vance. From the Hallmark Hall of Fame Collection.

The Memory Book, 20140726000000 +0000, At a flea market, Chloe discovers a book of photos showcasing the romance of a young couple from the early seventies. She sets out on a literal and emotional journey to find the happy couple she knows only through photos.

The Runaway (Crown Media), 20001210000000 +0000, Racial tensions flare in 1949 Georgia when an old murder case involving the deaths of three black men is reopened. Stars Dean Cain, Pat Hingle, and Maya Angelou. From the Hallmark Hall of Fame Collection.

Missing Pieces, 20000206000000 +0000, A Colorado rancher uncovers a bed of lies and unanswered questions as he investigates his son's apparent suicide. Stars James Coburn. From the Hallmark Hall of Fame Collection.

Anne Tyler's Saint Maybe, 19981231000000 +0000, The story of a young man seeking forgiveness for his brother's death. Stars Mary Louise Parker and Blythe Danner. From the Hallmark Hall of Fame Collection.

August Creek, 20170807000000 +0000, Erica (Courtney Ford) left her Iowa hometown after she lost her soldier husband, but three years later she returns for her sister's wedding and has to face the love she left behind.

Cedar Cove, 20130720000000 +0000, When Olivia Lockhart (Andie MacDowell) is given the opportunity for a federal judgeship, she must face the challenging decision, and while tempting, she risks losing her new romance and leaving the town and people she loves most.

Hello, It's Me, 20150927000000 +0000, A woman coping with the loss of her husband and the task of raising two children on her own meets a handsome, rich man but doesn't feel right about pursuing anything. Stars Kellie Martin and Kavan Smith.

programme.title: Off The Grid
programme.desc: Stargate SG-1, S09E16, Hank Landry (Beau Bridges) and the rest of the Stargate team plan an offensive when they learn that the Goa'uld Ba'al is in the United States and is once again regaining power. Ben Browder, Michael Shanks, Amanda Tapping, and Christopher Judge star.

programme.title: The Scourge
programme.desc: Stargate SG-1, S09E17, A crop of genetically engineered insects turns deadly, forcing the SG-1 team to destroy them before they and the visiting international diplomats becoming their next victims. Ben Browder, Michael Shanks, Amanda Tapping, and Christopher Judge star.

programme.title: Arthur's Mantle
programme.desc: Stargate SG-1, S09E18, While Teal'c sets off to investigate foul play on a Jaffa planet, Mitchell, Carter and Daniel become out of phase while experimenting with a powerful and ancient device. Ben Browder, Michael Shanks, Amanda Tapping, and Christopher Judge star.

programme.title: Crusade
programme.desc: Stargate SG-1, S09E19, Vala returns to Stargate Command to deliver startling news: the Ori have been building military forces, and plan to launch crusades against their dissidents in the near future. Ben Browder, Michael Shanks, Amanda Tapping, and Christopher Judge star.

programme.title: Camelot
programme.desc: Stargate SG-1, S09E20, As the Ori's all out assault. looms closer, lieutenant Colonel Cameron Mitchell and Daniel Jackson race to locate a device that will obliterate the evil enemy once and for all. Ben Browder, Michael Shanks, Amanda Tapping, and Christopher Judge star.

programme.title: Flesh And Blood
programme.desc: Stargate SG-1, S10E01, As their battle with the Ori continues, the team struggles to reunite and formulate a plan to defeat their enemy. Vala (Claudia Black), still aboard an Ori ship, watches as her newly born child quickly ages and is molded to lead the Ori army.

programme.title: Morpheus
programme.desc: Stargate SG-1, S10E02, On a mission to find a weapon that will defeat their powerful foe, the team finds a planet whose inhabitants were killed by a mysterious illness, and unwittingly fall victim to the illness themselves. Starring Ben Browder and Michael Shanks.

programme.title: The Pegasus Project
programme.desc: Stargate SG-1, S10E03, SG-1 travels to the Pegasus Galaxy and the city of Atlantis in hopes to find a clue to a weapon that can destroy the Ori. Starring Ben Browder, Amanda Tapping, Christopher Judge, Claudia Black, Beau Bridges, and Michael Shanks.

programme.title: Sabotage
programme.desc: Stargate Universe, S01E16, With crew members stranded, Destiny continues to cross from the present galaxy into the next one. Unable to alter the Destiny's course, Dr. Rush calculates the Destiny will fall short of making it to the next galaxy, stranding them indefinitely.

programme.title: Letters From Pegasus
programme.desc: Stargate Atlantis, S01E17, McKay discovers a way for the team to send messages to Earth, allowing the team to send messages to their loved ones as the Wraith approach the city. Sheppard and Teyla leave Atlantis in the hopes of gathering information about the Wraith army.

programme.title: The Gift
programme.desc: Stargate Atlantis, S01E18, Plagued by terrifying nightmares, Teyla (Rachel Luttrell) begins to recall a time when she and her father were captured by the Wraith and subjected to disturbing experiments. With the help of an old Athosian woman, Teyla looks deep into her past.

programme.title: The Siege (Part 1)
programme.desc: Stargate Atlantis, S01E19, With a group of Wraith hive ships on the way to Atlantis, the team searches for a place to flee and a way to destroy the city. McKay (David Hewlett) leads a team to try and activate the Ancients' orbital weapons platform to destroy the Wraith.

programme.title: The Siege (Part 2)
programme.desc: Stargate Atlantis, S01E20, Just as the team is beginning to lose hope, Col. Everett is sent from the Stargate Program on Earth. As Everett and the team strategize, a new battleship, the Daedalus, arrives with a new Zero Point Module, bringing with it new hope.

programme.title: The Siege (Part 3)
programme.desc: Stargate Atlantis, S02E01, The team is saved with the arrival of Colonel Steven Caldwell, the Daedalus, and the destruction of the two approaching Wraith ships. McKay hopes the Zero Point Module will be the key to their success, meanwhile Ford seems off after an accident.

programme.title: Intruder
programme.desc: Stargate Atlantis, S02E02, Sheppard starts to question things when strange malfunctions begin to occur after the team returns from a trip to Earth. The team discovers that the Daedalus has been infected with a Wraith Virus, causing the ship to go into survival mode.

programme.title: Runner
programme.desc: Stargate Atlantis, S02E03, The search for Lt. Ford leads Sheppard and Teyla to planet P3M-736 where they are captured by Ronon Dex, a man who is on the run, being hunted by the Wraith. The team offer to help Ronon, going up against the Wraith once again.

programme.title: Duet
programme.desc: Stargate Atlantis, S02E04, While on Planet Thenora, the team is shocked when McKay and marine officer Laura Cadman are suddenly taken aboard a Wraith Dart. When the team shoots down the Dart, they discover a technical glitch has put Cadman's consciousness in McKay's body.

programme.title: Judgment Day
programme.desc: Beverly Hills, 90210, S07E12, Steve elects to plead guilty, leaving his punishment to the lenient Chancellor Arnold. Brandon refuses to plead guilty to a crime he did not commit, and faces a hearing and possible expulsion. Felice objects to Donna's renewed relationship with David.

programme.title: Unnecessary Roughness
programme.desc: Beverly Hills, 90210, S07E15, Donna believes she has solved the mystery of her stalker's identity when she sees Garrett Slan, the man who tried to rape her, at the university.

programme.title: Face-Off
programme.desc: Beverly Hills, 90210, S07E16, Donna's request for a permanent restraining order against Slan is denied. Tracy accidentally tells Brandon that she loves him. Steve and Clare consider living together as they spend a weekend house sitting. David takes an interest in a young singer.

programme.title: We Interrupt This Program
programme.desc: Beverly Hills, 90210, S07E17, Donna's stalker confesses and holds the entire staff of the TV station hostage.

programme.title: With This Ring
programme.desc: Beverly Hills, 90210, S07E19, Brandon and Kelly each confess their feelings to friends, but expect the other person to make a move. Donna tries to reconcile with David. Steve and Clare double date with Ryan and his girlfriend.

programme.title: A Ripe Young Age
programme.desc: Beverly Hills, 90210, S07E20, Donna and David visit her grandmother in San Luis Obispo. Noting a striking resemblance between David and her late husband, Mrs. Martin tells the couple about her romance with Donna's grandfather.

programme.title: Storm Warnings
programme.desc: Beverly Hills, 90210, S07E21, Joey returns to the beach apartment. Rob irritates his manager by seeking Val's advice about whether to sign on for a new movie. Jim and Cindy invite Brandon to spend spring vacation in Hong Kong.

programme.title: Spring Breakdown
programme.desc: Beverly Hills, 90210, S07E22, Brandon and Tracy visit Jim in Hong Kong; Cindy is in London helping Brenda cope with mononucleosis. Clare and Steve encourage Kelly to go out instead of moping around the apartment.

programme.title: Heaven Sent
programme.desc: Beverly Hills, 90210, S07E23, Mariah comes to town to give a lecture at the university's new age festival. She develops an instant connection with Kelly, prompting Tracy to bristle. David tries to plan a special evening for Donna.

programme.title: All That Jazz
programme.desc: Beverly Hills, 90210, S07E26, Brandon has to take care of Kelly and Valerie, who are both laid up with the flu. The girls discuss the reasons for their feud.

programme.title: Mother's Day
programme.desc: Beverly Hills, 90210, S07E27, Kelly learns that she is pregnant. Val makes a pass at David, prompting Donna to order him to end their working relationship. Clare is saddened by Mother's Day, so Steve tries to take her mind off things by going for a drive.

programme.title: The Way We Weren't
programme.desc: Beverly Hills, 90210, S08E04, Brandon is heartbroken when Kelly is unable to remember their relationship. Valerie helps organize Donna when she has trouble keeping track of her clients. Donna decides to make Val her business partner.

programme.title: Coming Home
programme.desc: Beverly Hills, 90210, S08E05, Kelly moves back into the beach apartment. A designer offers to purchase Donna's work. David manages a rock band and allows the lead singer to crash at the apartment.

programme.title: The Right Thing
programme.desc: Beverly Hills, 90210, S08E06, Brandon and Donna discover that Rush owns the building that houses the sweatshop. David's credit problems escalate. Kelly fails to identify the shooter from the police lineup.

programme.title: Pride And Prejudice
programme.desc: Beverly Hills, 90210, S08E07, Brandon's overprotection alienates Kelly; Donna learns she's been stabbed in the back by Valerie, who juggles her rich man and her poor man on a dinner cruise attended by Steve and Carly.

programme.title: Child Of The Night
programme.desc: Beverly Hills, 90210, S08E10, Erica is arrested for prostitution and released into Kelly and Brandon's custody. Jodi claims that Steve is the only man who could have possibly fathered her child. Mel helps David file for bankruptcy and pay back Donna.

programme.title: Deadline
programme.desc: Beverly Hills, 90210, S08E11, Brandon is arrested for obstructing justice. David moves into the office at the After Dark and accidentally starts a fire. Valerie visits Sands and learns that Noah paid off David's debt.

programme.title: Search and Rescue
programme.desc: Baywatch, S07E10, After rescuing a group of fishermen and tourists from a pier fire, Samantha and L.A. fire chief Captain Huntingdon form an elite joint Search and Rescue unit. Meanwhile, Cody asks CJ to paint his portrait, and Mitch receives some strange PI work.

programme.title: Heal the Bay
programme.desc: Baywatch, S07E11, Donna and Caroline work with Heal the Bay after a recent rainstorm washes inland pollutants into the waters off Santa Monica. Mitch falls ill after he unknowing swims over sunken drums of toxic chemicals.

programme.title: Bachlor of the Month
programme.desc: Baywatch, S07E12, Mitch has been chosen Flash Magazine's Bachelor of the Month, a designation that leads to wild complications. Stephanie is making plans for her wedding to Tom, but her sister Caroline keeps getting in the way.

programme.title: Chance of a Lifetime
programme.desc: Baywatch, S07E13, Stephanie and Tom go on their honeymoon in a two-mast schooner with a group of troubled teenagers, with Mitch and Neely along for help. All is going well until they get trapped in a hurricane and the ship starts sinking!

programme.title: Talk Show
programme.desc: Baywatch, S07E14, Mitch gets his “15 minutes of fame” when he rescues Jay Leno from choking, and a female talk show host from drowning. Caroline and CJ adopt a stray dog swimming in the ocean that mystically reminds them of Stephanie.

programme.title: Life Guardian
programme.desc: Baywatch, S07E15, After Caroline, Neely and Manny rescue three orphan teenage boys from drowning, Caroline seeks out the enigmatic, mysterious youth who helped her rescue one of the boys. Neely's ex-husband returns, complicating her life.

programme.title: Matters of the Heart
programme.desc: Baywatch, S07E16, Manny is haunted by his past when two juvenile delinquents from his home borough in East LA arrive at Baywatch for community service. Meanwhile, Neely suspects Mitch and Samantha are becoming more than coworkers.

programme.title: Rendezvous
programme.desc: Baywatch, S07E17, When a young couple’s romance is threatened by their parents, they make a pact to end their lives together rather than end their romance. Meanwhile, Cody encounters a mermaid while diving, and of course no one believes him… except CJ.

programme.title: Hot Water
programme.desc: Baywatch, S07E18, While testing new scuba diving technology, Sam, Neely and Caroline witness a jet crash. They rescue the pilot, who reveals that he was transporting a canister that contains a deadly virus. Meanwhile, the team must shut down an illegal nude beach.

programme.title: Baywatch at Sea World
programme.desc: Baywatch, S07E19, Caroline finds herself being sued for negligence in civil court by the angry and bitter mother of a drowning victim. CJ babysits a neighbor’s newborn and realizes she wants to be a mother. But is Cody ready to be a father?

programme.title: Trial by Fire
programme.desc: Baywatch, S07E20, CJ and Cody transport an injured sea lion to the animal recovery facility at Sea World. While there, Samantha gets the idea to promote lifeguarding by planning a Baywatch-theme stunt show at Sea World.

programme.title: Golden Girls
programme.desc: Baywatch, S07E21, A crazed young woman is causing trouble on the Venice Boardwalk and Neely suspects it is more than meets the eye. Meanwhile, Newman meets his dream woman – who doesn’t speak English.

programme.title: Nevermore
programme.desc: Baywatch, S07E22, A mysterious, disfigured man whom the public dubs "the phantom lifeguard," is secretly saving people and sending love notes to CJ. When CJ goes missing the team sets out to find her and the “phantom.”

programme.title: Rookie Summer
programme.desc: Baywatch, S08E01, Young, ambitious and sexy lifeguard candidates compete for a chance to attend Rookie School. Mitch is offered a promotion to Captain and has a tough decision to make. Lani McKensie faces the sinister return of a former lover.

programme.title: Next Generation
programme.desc: Baywatch, S08E02, Hobie, Lani, April, and Skylar are among the trainees competing for a few open slots as Baywatch Lifeguards. Hobie isn't sure he wants to follow in his father's footsteps, but when a vengeful jet skier comes after April, Hobie comes to her rescue.

programme.title: The Choice
programme.desc: Baywatch, S08E03, Veteran lifeguard Jack 'JD' Darius has a dark secret in his past. He comes to Baywatch to throw his rescue can in the ring for the open Lieutenant slot, but young and ambitious Taylor Walsh also wants the job, and she's ready to fight for it.

programme.title: Memorial Day
programme.desc: Baywatch, S08E04, Mitch, Sky, and April find a dead man on the ocean floor. Their search for answers to his demise leads to the retirement home where he lived, and his two friends who seem to be hiding the true story. The chemistry between Cody and Lani heats up.
